Name: El Camello Loco
Ingredients: 45 ml Bacardi Carta Blanca Superior White Rum
10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass and stir.
Review: Somewhat reminiscent of a Michelada without the spice, this is a very refreshing and enjoyable beer-influenced cocktail. Strangely, the beer makes the lime shine.
History: The Israeli Bacardí Legacy 2016 winning cocktail by Bar Shira, Imperial Craft Cocktail Bar/ La Otra, Tel Aviv.
Nutrition: One serving of El Camello Loco contains 214 calories
